settings.richtext:
Thank you for visiting and shopping at Pai Technology. Following are the terms and conditions that constitute our Shipping Policy.

Domestic Shipping Policy (US)

settings.title: Shipment processing time
settings.richtext:
All orders are processed within 2-3 business days. Orders are not shipped or delivered on weekends or holidays.

Normal Shipping time: 2~7 business days.

If we are experiencing a high volume of orders, shipments may be delayed by a few days. Please allow additional days in transit for delivery. If there is a significant delay in the shipment of your order, we will contact you via email or telephone.

settings.title: Shipping rates & delivery estimates
settings.richtext:
Shipping charges for your order will be calculated and displayed at checkout.

* Overnight delivery is only available for orders with delivery addresses within the continental United States.

Delivery delays can occasionally occur.

settings.title: Shipping coverage
settings.richtext: United States. However, there are exceptions, such as delivery being unavailable to PO Boxes and US military zones APO, AP, FPO, AA.

settings.title: Shipment confirmation & order tracking
settings.richtext: You will receive a Shipment Confirmation email once your order contains your tracking number(s). The tracking number will be active within 24 hours.

settings.title: Customs, duties and taxes
settings.richtext: Pai Technology is not responsible for any customs and taxes applied to your order. All fees imposed during or after shipping are the responsibility of the customer (tariffs, taxes, etc.).

settings.title: Damages
settings.richtext: Pai Technology is not liable for any products damaged or lost during shipping. If you received your order damaged, please contact the shipment carrier to file a claim. Please save all packaging materials and damaged goods before filing a claim.

settings.title: International shipping policy
settings.richtext: We currently do not ship outside the U.S.
